channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large potholes on both sides of road, 1st February
item.description:
Potholes down the middle of the road are unavoidable due to parked cars on both sides.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athelney Way, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Several large pot holes on left hand side driving from Down Hatherley lane to innsworth lane, 31st January
item.description:
Too many potholes to list individually, the left side of the road is gradually being warn away The majority of frog furling lane is affected going towards innsworth lane. This is a health and safety issue as cars trying to miss potholes are further into the path of oncoming traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tarmac missing around drain is now dangerous especially for motorcycle or cyclist., 31st January

item.title: Many potholes along Tewkesbury road near the railway bridge, 31st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 456, High Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Many potholes along Argyll Road where there's parked cars, 31st January
item.description:
Many potholes along Argyll Road. Parked cars are on one side of the road, therefore only one side of the road can be driven on. This makes it difficult to navigate around the pot holes in a vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Argyll Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
